member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION
member.summary: Identifies the type of resource that will be viewed as a shader resource.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1DARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of 1D textures.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of 2D textures.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS
member.summary: The resource is a multisampling 2D texture.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of multisampling 2D textures.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURECUBE
member.summary: The resource is a cube texture.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURECUBEARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of cube textures.

member.name: D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D12_SRV_DIMENSION_RAYTRACING_ACCELERATION_STRUCTURE
member.summary: The resource is a raytracing acceleration structure.
